name: Kids4Sign ASL Colors
description:
Kids4Sign ASL Colors has been designed to teach children in a fun way how to identify colors in ASL. Colors are taught gradually through bright fun levels and a satisfying rocket reward system to encourage children to continue learning. The final level is a fast paced tapping frenzy of fun putting to use everything learned!

Since we live in a world where our children are constantly faced with many types of stimulus, and taking into consideration our target audience, it was decided that Kids4Sign apps will have no sound so that the user focuses only on the visual aspect of learning.

Enjoy the game!
